# For ENTIRE PERIOD
# Calculated only from years with less than 2 months missing
#
#   LQ:   lowest monthly discharge from the entire period
#   MQ_1: mean discharge of all monthly discharges in the period [m³/s]
#   MQ_2: mean discharge volume per year of all monthly discharges in the period [km³/a]
#   MQ_3: mean runoff per year of all monthly discharges in the period [mm/a]
#   HQ:   highest monthly discharge from the entire periode
#   n:    number of available months used for MQ calculation
#
LQ;MQ_1;MQ_2;MQ_3;HQ;n
   597.097;  2088.523;    65.864;       457;  6697.333; 2318
#
#
# For EACH MONTH of the year (12 records covering max. n years)
# Calculated only for months with <= 10 missing days
#
#   month: month (1=January)
#   LQ:    lowest monthly discharge of the given month in the entire period
#   year:  associated year of occurrence (only the first occurence is listed)
#   MQ:    mean discharge from all monthly discharges of the given month in the entire period
#   HQ:    highest monthly discharge of the given month in the entire period
#   year:  associated year of occurrence (only the first occurence is listed)
#   std:   standard deviation of all monthly discharges of the given month in the entire period
#   n:     number of available daily values used for computation
#
month;LQ;year;MQ;HQ;year;std;n
